tag_list: daily, deals, bargains, health, beauty, wellness, fitness
overview: Welcome to Healthydeals.com! We have created a unique social shopping platform for deals that really matter. We bring you some of the most awesome deals at unprecedented savings, up to 80% off, from all your local health, beauty and wellness products and services providers. As more and more people are turning towards a healthier lifestyle, the need for quality products and services at affordable prices is increasing. At HealthyDeals we do all the ground work to bring these compelling deals to you. Each week, we will curate a selection of unique offerings that represents all your city has to offer. We are highly selective about the deals we feature, opting for vendors who have been recommended by our network of experts, not just who give us the best deal. The idea behind the site is to provide users with a trusted source for quality deals which are certified and tested by professionals. Our deals are not only good for your health but also for your wallet.
